events.text: The church at Antioch fasts and prays
The Spirit sets apart Barnabas and Saul
They sail to Cyprus and preach
A sorcerer is opposed and struck blind
They travel to Pisidian Antioch and preach in the synagogue
Some believe while others oppose them
They face persecution and move on to other cities
They strengthen disciples and appoint elders
They return to Antioch and report what God has done
